ygData.subject: Re: Gnomestock 99'
ygData.msgSnippet: In addition to having a coordinator on each server for supplying supplies we should notfy the gms ahead of time to see if they can offer some special quest or
ygData.messageBody:
In addition to having a coordinator on each server for supplying supplies we
should notfy the gms ahead of time to see if they can offer some special
quest or entertainment for us exceptional small people. since most of u are
on bertoxx thats a good place to start, i propose this coming weekend friday
or satuday night. additionally other gnomes on the servers can announce the
gnome only party so the locals can attend with us skilled tinkerers, all we
need is a party planner and i am rdy to bring my lvl 1 into the mix=)
Dwizz Singez
34 mage tribunal
